text: Genevieve Cortese (also Genevieve Padalecki; born January 8, 1981) is an American actress. She works in movies and television. She played Kris Furillo on the television series Wildfire. She played Ruby in the show Supernatural. She played Veronica in the 2012 movie Hated. Cortese was born in Danville, California. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from San Francisco Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Genevieve Cortese
